website_summaries.verdict: Basic, frill-free disposable protectors that will last you a long time and won't stress your budget. Put them on your range and you are ready to cook and cut down on cleanup time.
pros: An affordable pack of 45 protectors that are made of aluminum foil
8.5-inch size is universal and fits most standard range burners
cons: Somewhat flimsy, but many users found that they last a while when handled gently
May require a bit of trimming when using on larger burners

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with these gas burner protectors...I have two sizes of burners and these only fit the large size...they are very flimsy, and I have to use two at once.....would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and would tear if you try to reuse them
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can just throw them away, but they don't fit around my burners because I have different size burners on each side. They are very thin and I wouldn't even attempt to clean them, they would just be a mess. I cut them to fit the burners but wish I didn't have to. I also bought in bulk so I could just throw them out once they became messy.
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: Work saver
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others the top of stoves are difficult to keep clean. The more you scrub to get the grease off the more the stove looks worse than when you started. I found these Aluminum squares fit well on my stove and since my stove is black top and stainless steel bottom these squares do not look bad. The plus is they are easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: Do you hate cleaning around your gas burners???
customer_reviews.text: I hate cleaning my glass range, so I was glad to find these. They are perfect to absorb splatters and spills, and they last a long time. I often wipe them off and reuse. I even put them in the dishwasher. Dishwasher will discolor them, but who cares? I can always remove them or use new ones when company comes to dinner. They are inexpensive and last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: MariLew

customer_reviews.title: Makes clean up super easy
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty thin compared to previous ones I've boughten but they still work perfect for what I wanted-to protect and keep my original metal liners looking good and ease the clean up from spills. The first time I used one the inside of the ring kept lighting on fire so I learned I have to push them down and form them to the shape of my stove top (almost like you would aluminum foil) and that kept them out of the flame and haven't had a problem with that since. When I have a spill I can just throw it away and grab another one.
customer_reviews.author: Delena

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. They are easy to replace when they get dirty and they keep the stove top from getting burned on crud that's hard to get off. The seller got them to me in very short time after I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a house and it came with a gas stove. I am not a fan of gas stoves, but my husband cooks; therefore, my opinion doesn't have much leverage! Ha! I bought these in hopes of keeping the stove top clean(er) after use and they lived up to the expectation. I graded the "easy to clean" a 3, because I honestly haven't tried cleaning them. They are inexpensive enough to where I just switch them out every so often. I'm super thrilled with my purchase and would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Patko

customer_reviews.title: Image says 50 pack however received completely different item that has pack of 45
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 50 foil gas burner liners and received a different package with only 45 liners. Seems like a scam and the description is a lit. Quality is terrible - these are junk. Will not purchase again and I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tym Belseth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: It says 50 peices and it is only 45...however, yes they are thinner than ones I have used in the past.......but the whole reason of having these are a one time use. Toss them when they get icky, the price is great. No need to try to reuse them. Also, they fit all my different size burners.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Az

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality, but deforms easily.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since i am tired of cleaning the top. tried all kinds of heavy duty cleaners including ecolab commercial cleaner. it s a pain in the as- Small for our fridgedaire 5 stove range. Not a best fit. maybe good for conventional oven. And deforms easily.
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job of keeping the stove clean well!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for what we use them for. We replace them when they get dirty. They are not easy to clean because they are thin. So you just replace them. They slide around some so I would say the durability isn't the greatest. But for the price that's what I expected. Very easy to use just put on stove and throw away when dirty. Keeps our gas stove nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them!! So easy to use and they looks great on my stove 👍🏼 Will buy more soon😃
customer_reviews.author: Bambina🐶

customer_reviews.title: Not quite perfect, but not bad either!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good but a bit small for my range, which has 9x9 openings. The fit around the burner base is pretty close though. I don’t know if we will bother to rewash them or not. I guess we will if the drippings are not burned on. My husband fries breakfast food 7 days a week and I tire of cleaning up the stove top. These will help.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: This order was actually to replace my dwindling supply. These are so handy to have on hand. I hate scrubbing a greasy stove top, so these are the best thing I have for my gas stove. I always have a new set out when we have company and I keep them in use everyday. I recommend this product and will continue to use them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tutt

customer_reviews.title: dirt keeper
customer_reviews.text: These are great for putting on your stove top because people do not want to clean it. IIt is a great value for your money. This makes people lazy. They leave the dirt on the stove and just cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the quality, feels flimsy to me. I have current liners bought from Walmart and they were out of stock so ordered from Amazon. price is good but i wish the product was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Found them just in time!
customer_reviews.text: At first I hesitated to buy 45 of them at once, but since they have become unavailable where I live, I went for it. I'm glad I did since they are every bit as good as the ones I can't get any more, at a comparable price and delivered to my door, what's not to like.. There's nothing worse to clean than the grunge on a gas range and these keep it off very well.
customer_reviews.author: Raybo

customer_reviews.title: Great answer to grunge
customer_reviews.text: Good product that helps keep things cleaner longer. We are heavy users of our gas range and it doesn't take long to go from spotless to grungy. These covers work well at keeping the grunge on the cover instead of the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Technan

customer_reviews.title: I will order these again
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased similar stove burner covers locally but could no longer find them. I am so glad I ordered these, as I prefer the ones I have been using. These are more like "heavy duty" foil; therefore, I can bend them down in places to make them fit more snugly against the stove and not interfere with the burner.
customer_reviews.author: mooeylinda

customer_reviews.title: They Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: I buy these to place under the burners of my Jenn-Air gas range. They do their job, but are thinner than a name brand I've used in the past that was a bit more substantial. So they're going to bend quickly. But for the price, I'll use them. I am not sure they would stand up to a wash and re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our Fridgedaire Gas Range. They fit much better than the generic steel/chrome items and at a small fraction of the cost. At this price they are disposable so it doesn't matter if they are thin and won't be easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Love these disposable burner bibs
customer_reviews.text: Love these disposable burner bibs! I was so tired of trying to clean sticky stuff around the burners and these are perfect. Not to mention they look pretty stylish on our stainless steel, black top oven. I put a set on all 4 burners about a month ago and haven't replaced them yet, so I imagine this pack will last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JTavano

customer_reviews.title: You've got to be kidding!
customer_reviews.text: These aluminum stove burner covers are amazingly thin. Think of cheap aluminum foil and then slice that in half. Plus, I had to cut all of them to not only fit the large burner (which is what I expected) but the medium burners as well. What ever happened to those nice thick aluminum foil ones that came packaged in small, medium, and large? I'll keep hunting. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Margaretmary

customer_reviews.title: Saves clean ups
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new range and these help tremendously!!! They are thin and do leave some space between each burner, but I think there great!! saves me alot of cleaning!! I like the fact that I can wipe them down and reuse them a few times before having to replace them. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: adellmarie

customer_reviews.title: My stove always looks like I’ve spent time cleaning
customer_reviews.text: One of the questions was “easy to clean?” Unnecessary! That’s the beauty. When they get too dirty...throw them out! I can change them almost every week. The cost is $12. Easily worth it. Think of the time saved. My time is valuable to me! $1 a month to never have to scrub the stovetop.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: This item is good for the big burners only. I really thought they would ha e had different sizes for the smaller burners.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I was buying these for way more at the local discount store. Just use them and throw away. Great to have so many on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Saves you time and elbow grease
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I have come across these years ago, I use them all the time. They save me time and energy when cleaning down the stove. Whether your have an electric or gas stove, these are very useful, especially when your pot boils over...which seems to always happen when I am suddenly called away to change a diaper for my little one. These liners catch debris and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonCH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Needed to cut out some for different size burners after 3 wks still working great. Shipping packageing was not the best
customer_reviews.author: Sam G

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product, they work well and are very convenient. My only gripe is that I had to straighten and unbend the product after delivery. Since they are made of foil they arrived bent and crushed flat in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Yingling

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than other brands and hence dont tear easily. So if you want, you can either throw the dirty ones every 3-4 months and replace it with new ones OR you can even clean these using a wire brush and hot suds!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use these pans all of the time. I don't have to worry about cleaning them because they are meant to dispose of when they get too dirty. They save my stove and hands from scratchy cleaners. I received them very quickly and in excellent condition. I would recommend this seller and this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stove protector
customer_reviews.text: These are the best in keeping my stove clean! I can throw them away and replace This is my 2nd or 3rd time buying them. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Moe joe

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product. The only thing I would like better is for a liner to fit the large burner. I had to snip and fold.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Stove now easier to clean but foil square is also disposable
customer_reviews.text: Makes cleaning stovetop so much easier. I like the option of cleaning the cover or throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: rochrich

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit very nicely around each burner. I thought the foil would be a little thicker, but they are sturdy enough to catch spills. When it came to clean the stove top, things went so smoothly. I just re-ordered a bunch more because I never want to be without
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: no more problems
customer_reviews.text: I love them. If you have old hands, it's not easy, so I only exchange them, and --hurrah, everything is fine again
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Foil squares
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom she’s happy it’s a pack of fifty I wish I found them in metal but over all they good for the purpose of using them would recommend they are disposable
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Torres

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product But............
customer_reviews.text: These burner covers are decent but don't quite fit our gas range burners. The fire hits the side of the covers and they don't quite cover the entire surface of the burner.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Keep your stove top clean the easy way
customer_reviews.text: This has literally been a lifesaver for me. I have sinus sensitivities to easy off so I try to use it as sparingly as possible. And these little foil packs make it possible for me to keep my stove top clean and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Resendez

customer_reviews.title: Will not order these
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I don’t think so I will order again. Coz my previous ones where more thicker than these which I ordered on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nahid Shahnawaz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy those products out of supermarkets, it cost way more than this, and the quality isn't good as these. Great products, second time buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Lam

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin and look terrible when installed. We thought they would be a little heavier. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Most useful product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery - and great liners. I've been using these stove top burner liners for a few years. Hardly exciting subject but these make clean-up so much easier. They're sturdy, fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pryvarski

customer_reviews.title: Many covers
customer_reviews.text: You will receive more than enough I will order more just to have them on hand
customer_reviews.author: Sharifa_Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what it is
customer_reviews.text: These will last us for a long while & fits' perfectly on our old basic stove
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best product available.
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely perfect. Received quickly and seller is a responsible merchant. My wife loves them and fits perfectly on our new stove. Material is top notch. Highly recommend. There is a good reason why it`s an Amazon Choice.
customer_reviews.author: artie11235

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: They fit my stove perfectly, I like that they come in a 45 pack so I don’t have to figure out how to clean them without messing up the shape. I’ll be buying them again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Book Luvah

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: very good value for money. yes O also had to cut one of them to have a bigger opening, but thats because my stove has one huge burner for big pots. I will buy then again when I run out
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Good product - not consistent when reordering
customer_reviews.text: More durable than dollar store/cheaper versions so can reuse several times if needed. Would purchase again. UPDATE: I reordered the product one one of lesser quality arrived. A bit thinner and slightly smaller. Reduced from 4 to 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: S. Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. They are as expected. They perform their purpose. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad that I hadn’t discovered these things sooner! I HATE scrubbing my stovetops, and these take all the work out of it! They fit just right and look nice!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the quality of it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the quality of it... in past I bought similar from local store near by and found it very useful and cost effective. Product which I bought from Amazon was not up to mark.
customer_reviews.author: Munna

customer_reviews.title: These make cleaning the kitchen so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the easiest and cheapest way to keep your stove top clean! I change them once every couple of weeks (or more often, if needed), and the packages of 45 last for months.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Holes too small
customer_reviews.text: My gas burners don’t like these..the holes are too small, so I have to cut them to make them bigger and sometimes the fire goes under the covers. That was scary and nearly burned my hand once. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Thin, not easy to clean, but very cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin, doesn’t keep shape, not so easy to clean. Fairly cheap, you get a lot of them for the price. They don’t hold up too well lose shape easily without cleaning. Tarnish easily, after a few uses you may have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bargain
customer_reviews.text: Best price for a bunch of aluminum liners. Does what it’s supposed to. For my stove, I need to put a little piece of foil underneath the pairs to prevent stuff getting between.
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Time Savers
customer_reviews.text: These are such time savers when cleaning the kitchen and saves me from having to scrub the stove top
customer_reviews.author: J. Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Tooooo thin, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say the quality isn’t good, too thin, like a piece of paper when I received it already deformed🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these a lot and used to get them 4 at a time. This package is much cheaper for how many you get. Worked as advertised. Good quality. Good price as well! Seller follows up just in case of problems. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Yenieuq

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and not durable. You could tear in in half. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMomNY

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in a timely manner. The product is durable and can be carefully washed or rinsed. I usually use mine for a good amount of time before I dispose of it. Also, I like this product because it keeps my stove top clean. The only con is the variations in stove nozzles and openings.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie wilfred

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, heavy duty, great value. I have been able to wash a few times before replacing.
customer_reviews.author: d cline

customer_reviews.title: It does what its suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: The product does what is suppose to do. The only thing is that is very thin. But it beats having to clean the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Sisy

customer_reviews.title: My stove looks new!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! I have a large family and we cook a lot so I purchased these to cover stains that won't come out! These worked like a charm!! Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M.

customer_reviews.title: Stove Burner Liners
customer_reviews.text: These are much thicker then the ones I was getting at the flee market. I am very happy with them. They are sturdy and don't rip. I will continue to buy these burner liners. Happy Customer with a clean stove!
customer_reviews.author: Violet K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very useful product but don't fit right for my stove.hope have more size..
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not a 50 pack
customer_reviews.text: Not a 50 pack, otherwise just another foil gas burner liner
customer_reviews.author: jmart

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good but not fit any size. It didn't fit my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but they do the job. I won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my stove stays cleaned!
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to clean, and they catch the messes really well. There is a minimal amount of cleaning required after cleaning. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be a little thicker but they work. I use them. I will order them again
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: These foil stove protectors are awesome, they fit well and save me from cleaning the stove daily. I will definitely order more!!!
customer_reviews.author: secret shopper

customer_reviews.title: Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my mother in laws stove to make it easy for her to clean. It is well worth the money! No mess in the burner and easy to work my way around it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy - almost as thin as aluminum foil. The dimensions are not big enough to cover a burner, so I end up still having to clean a lot of fallen food particles and grease splatter. Its better to take heavy duty aluminum foil and cover the area around the burner instead.
customer_reviews.author: me123

customer_reviews.title: Ordered product before.
customer_reviews.text: The product works! You don't clean them. They are designed to throw away when they get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Legal Eagle

customer_reviews.title: 45 Pack Aluminum Foil Square Stove Burner Covers
customer_reviews.text: Well made disposable stove burner covers. Probably could have bought just a dozen or less at the local dollar store for less for something disposable but wanted to try the quality of these.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Measure before you buy
customer_reviews.text: They fit my stove perfectly because I measured the dmensions exactly. Filled my expectations for durability because they are disposable and no more scrubbing! Arrived on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Patty R

customer_reviews.title: Giving 4 stars as foil is very thin not durable ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars as foil is very thin not durable.. but overall shipping and all had no issuesI wasn't able to find them anymore in market so ordered online .. they did solve my issues :) .
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A little adjustment here and there so the bigger burners work properly and here I am cooking again like Julia Child
customer_reviews.text: Almost wanted to stop cooking..okay at least fry things or do something messy since it is such a pain to clean my gas stove. Then I came across these and they really help to minimize the mess. A little adjustment here and there so the bigger burners work properly and here I am cooking again like Julia Child! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mattes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Use on propane gas stove- love them! Can clean off and reuse lasts long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: These are great linings for the stove! Especially the type of cooking we do with lots of oils and spices, keeps the stove clean and you can throw it away once it gets too dirty. Less time spent on cleaning the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Hafsa

customer_reviews.title: Saves time & elbow grease.
customer_reviews.text: Fits stove top perfectly, looks good. They have been on a week & haven't been soiled yet, but they're disposable so no need to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn6420

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: These are ones have been trying to find and could not. I like them better than the reusable. They can also be reused and are less expensive and if they get too bad it costs less for disposing
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy4050

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I put them in AJax-ed Tripple action solution and in a couple of minutes they are new!!! Let God bless your biz as I' blessed with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This will really help time I spend cleaning the stove top!!!! Highly recommend and delivered in a timely manner. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: YN

customer_reviews.title: Out of thousands of purchases on Amazon, this was by far the best, easiest to work with
customer_reviews.text: These came in better than perfect. Not only that, but they emailed me before I got them, and again after. What a descent, honest, company. You do not see companies like this anymore, and that is seriously sad. Great company
customer_reviews.author: FarRightExtremist

customer_reviews.title: Good. serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Look nice. Good price. Durability a question, but hey there are 45 of them !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready Made!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! I was using regular foil and having to replace it often. I can take these off when they get too dirty and put another one on in a matter of seconds. I am so amazed what people come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie TR

customer_reviews.title: Hassle free
customer_reviews.text: There’s not much to them. You take out the packs and place them on the eyes of the stove. They fit properly and catches all the drippings that would normally spill on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but wish the burner hole was smaller
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I got tired of cutting out aluminum foil to lay over my burners myself. This is definitely a great product and will save me time, but I do wish the center hole was smaller. With my stovetop there is almost a 2 centimeter gap between the burner and the aluminum edge for debris to get into sadly. Otherwise the product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my stovetop. Cover our 8” burners. Can wash gently for more than one use or just toss and replace.
customer_reviews.author: sahar nawab

customer_reviews.title: Thin but serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done.. makes your store look nice and clean/ cleaner...They are very thin though
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it makes your life really easy since ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it makes your life really easy since you don't have to spend a lot of time cleaning your stove. Plus it looks really nice and shiny on the top of your stove.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: Love the large pack. Fits really well on my burners. Thinner than expected but cleans easily l.
customer_reviews.author: Kahlua

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Much better quality than the old ones I bought at the grocery store! Instead of cleaning my stove all the time, I would use this and just replace when dirty! Super convenient!
customer_reviews.author: bi.ann

customer_reviews.title: I think these will work in keeping the burner bibs ...
customer_reviews.text: I think these will work in keeping the burner bibs clean. We have used tin foil in the past and it doesn't seem to the job. It is thinner than I hoped but for the price I believe this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Omoto

customer_reviews.title: The aluminum foils I received do not have the "new ...
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum foils I received do not have the "new feature" indented lip on them. But they work out for what I need. Thanks for the efficiency in filling the order and the quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: JWH

customer_reviews.title: Cheapens look of nice stove
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and food would have still gotten on them . For my stove at least, these were useless.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Many more in the pack than I realized! These are easy to use and fit fine ever around the largest burners.

product_meta.title: 50 PACK Aluminum Foil Square Stove Burner Covers Range Protectors Bib Liners Disposable Gas Burner Bibs Gas Top Liner Stove Easy Clean - (8.5" Square) from Spare
feature_bullets: ❶ NO MORE SCRUBBING THE STOVE - Stove burner covers that keep your stove clean at any time. Never scrape or clean the surface of your gas top for removing drips, spills or grease. Stove Easy Clean!

❷ BEST VALUE - NOT A CHEAP FOIL LINER - Top grade heavy duty foil. Non Toxic, odorless, ecofriendly, homeownwes approved and best in class quality foil range liner. Aluminum foil square shape. 45 Pack.
❸ SUPER EASY CLEANUP & DISPOSABLE - These range protectors can be used over and over again. Just wipe them clean with a damp cloth or remove and replace.

❹ NO MORE NASTY CHEMICALS - The ideal burner liners to stay safe and avoid the use of expensive, harsh and toxic cleaning products. Use these bib liners to protect your gas burners and forget about cleaning.
❺UNIVERSAL SIZE - 8.5" x 8.5" Foil Bib. Fits most gas stovetops
